intents.command_syntax: Provides syntax and examples for Unix commands
intents.troubleshooting: Helps diagnose and fix common Unix issues
intents.status_check: Provides commands to check system status
intents.process_management: Assists with process monitoring and management

commands.df: df -h - Display disk space usage in human-readable format
commands.grep: grep <pattern> <file> - Search for patterns in files
commands.ps: ps aux - Display all running processes

troubleshooting.Permission denied: Check file permissions with 'ls -l' and use 'chmod' or 'chown' to fix
troubleshooting.No such file or directory: Verify the file path exists and check for typos
troubleshooting.Command not found: The command may not be installed or not in PATH. Check with 'which <command>'

KB001.title: How to check system resource usage
KB001.content: Use 'top' for real-time monitoring, 'htop' for enhanced view, 'free -h' for memory, 'df -h' for disk space

KB002.title: User account management basics
KB002.content: Create user: 'useradd -m username', Set password: 'passwd username', Delete user: 'userdel -r username'
